name: Space Run (itch) (triblifriblidev)
description:
🌍 Want to take a break from earthly life exploring the galaxy as a spaceship driver? This game is for you.

🎮 Space run is an arcade space game, where you can become a rocket pilot and fly in the endless space dodging different obstacles like meteorites, asteroids, space sputniks and etc. 

🛰 This game let you explore the galaxy filled with space stars, planets and space stations. In your infinite races you will find different boosts flying in cosmos. 
Now game contains 4 boosts:
- 🧲 Coin magnet
- 💲 Double coins
- 🔋 Battery - which gives you extra power to fly realy fast and destroy obstacles getting money for every obstacle
- 🛡 Shield - which can save your life

🚀 Space run contains different spaceships and rockets which you can buy for diamonds and coins and before buying a new rocket you can test-drive it. Different spaceships has different durations of boosts usage, better rockets gives you oportunity to collect more coins and make your space flight more effective.

🥉🥈🥇 This game can be called a space runner or a space racing game because here your main goal is to fly as far as you can. In this space game you can open leaderboard and see distances of longest space flights of other players and you.
